definition[0]: to have a meeting with someone
example[0]: Representatives of EU countries will meet with senior American politicians to discuss the trade crisis.
definition[1]: to get a particular reaction or result
example[1]: His comments have met with widespread opposition.
example[2]: Her ideas have met with support from doctors and health professionals.
example[3]: Our attempts at negotiation finally met with some success.
definition[2]: to be injured or killed in an accident
